mapper.insert: insert into banner(bannerid , bannername , addtime , memo ) values(#{bannerid} , #{bannername} , #{addtime} , #{memo} )
mapper.update: update banner set bannername=#{bannername} , addtime=#{addtime} , memo=#{memo} where bannerid=#{bannerid}
mapper.select: select a.* from banner a order by bannerid asc
select a.* from banner a where bannerid=#{bannerid} order by bannerid desc

select a.* from banner a where 1=1
and a.bannername like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{bannername}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.memo like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{memo}, '%'))
